that's unfair, he ran away!\""},{"lineNumber":1629,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイジはランスを追って逃げ出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Heidi chased after Rance as he ran scary!\""},{"lineNumber":1632,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、私はちょっとじゃなかったですよぉっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I wasn't just a little scary!\""},{"lineNumber":1633,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当家のメイドともあろうものが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For a maid of this household to...\""},{"lineNumber":1634,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まったく、騒がしい……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Truly, so noisy...\""},{"lineNumber":1635,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタはため息をひとつついて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta sighed once,"},{"lineNumber":1636,"originalJapaneseLine":"消えていく二人を見送った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and watched the two cleaning...\""},{"lineNumber":1638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふう……お手洗い終わりっ、と……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Phew... finished in the restroom...\""},{"lineNumber":1639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先輩、そっちは……あれ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Senpai, over there... huh?"},{"lineNumber":1640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　先輩がいない……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Senpai's not here...\""},{"lineNumber":1641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は〜あぁ。休憩休憩。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaah. Break, break."},{"lineNumber":1642,"originalJapaneseLine":"　真面目にやってたらマッチョになっちゃうわ」","translatedEnglishLine":" If I worked seriously, I'd get all muscular.\""},{"lineNumber":1643,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の裏庭で、ハイジは適当にサボっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the backyard of Rance Castle, Heidi was slacking off casually."},{"lineNumber":1644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メイド長も、あの城主様のおかげで","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The head maid also seems busy thanks to that lord of the castle."},{"lineNumber":1645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　忙しいみたいだし。","translatedEnglishLine":" She seems busy."},{"lineNumber":1646,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夕飯の支度までくらいは、ここで……」","translatedEnglishLine":" So I’ll just stay here at least until dinner preparation...\""},{"lineNumber":1647,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポケットからパンを取り出して囓りながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Taking bread out of her pocket and nibbling on it,"},{"lineNumber":1648,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイジはよっこらしょ、と腰を下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Heidi heaved herself down to sit."},{"lineNumber":1649,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":1650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":1651,"originalJapaneseLine":"目が合った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Our eyes met."},{"lineNumber":1652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーーーっ……！　メイドさん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aahh...! Maid-san...\""},{"lineNumber":1653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ス、ストーーーーップ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-Stoooop!!\""},{"lineNumber":1654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はむぐ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hamugu\" (muffled sound)"},{"lineNumber":1655,"originalJapaneseLine":"間一髪、ハイジはリセットの大きな口を","translatedEnglishLine":"At the last moment, Heidi blocked Reset’s big mouth"},{"lineNumber":1656,"originalJapaneseLine":"パンで塞いだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"with a piece of bread."},{"lineNumber":1657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むっぐもっぐ、まぐむぐ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmmgh mmmgh, mmmph mmmph\" (muffled chewing)"},{"lineNumber":1658,"originalJapaneseLine":"（くっ……サボりに来た先で","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ugh... To think I'd run into the castle's bombshell girl"},{"lineNumber":1659,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この城の爆弾娘と出くわすとは……）","translatedEnglishLine":" right where I came to slack off...)"},{"lineNumber":1660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごちそうさま。ありがとー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for the meal. Thanks!\""},{"lineNumber":1661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい。ココにいたことは内緒よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright. Keep it a secret that you were here.\""},{"lineNumber":1662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だめなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that not allowed?\""},{"lineNumber":1663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だめなのー。ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's not allowed. See?\""},{"lineNumber":1664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okaaay...\""},{"lineNumber":1665,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うっ、納得したような、してないような……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ugh, it feels like I agreed, but maybe not really..."},{"lineNumber":1666,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは危なそう……）","translatedEnglishLine":" This seems dangerous...)"},{"lineNumber":1667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー……何かして遊ぶ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... shall we do something to play?\""},{"lineNumber":1668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":1669,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":1670,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":1671,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":1672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ。だーれだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay. Guess who?\""},{"lineNumber":1673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えええ……よ、妖怪……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, eehh... a y-yokai (monster)...?"},{"lineNumber":1674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、こないだ迷い込んできたわんわん？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Oh, that's the dog that wandered in the other day?\""},{"lineNumber":1675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぶー。キャンテルさんだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Boo. It's Kantel-san!\""},{"lineNumber":1676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーっ、あのドラゴンの……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh, that dragon's...?"},{"lineNumber":1677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ドラゴンなら角とか付けてよー」","translatedEnglishLine":" If it's a dragon, you should put on horns or something!\""},{"lineNumber":1678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほら、これこれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here, like this.\""},{"lineNumber":1679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……これかあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuh... this, huh..."},{"lineNumber":1680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この絵から見抜くのは不可能では……」","translatedEnglishLine":" It's impossible to tell from this picture...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、じゃあ今回は不問って事で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, then let's consider it unasked this time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………それで宜しいのですか、ご主人様？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't mean to be forward, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご主人様は厨房にどのような用件が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what business do you have in the kitchen, Master...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイジはランスを追って逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heidi chased after Rance as he ran off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでご主人様が逃げるんですかっ」
「あのビスケッタさん、ちょっと怖かった！」
「わ、私はちょっとじゃなかったですよぉっ！」
「当家のメイドともあろうものが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For a maid of this household to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタはため息をひとつついて、
消えていく二人を見送った。
ふう……お手洗い終わりっ、と……」
真面目にやってたらマッチョになっちゃうわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I worked seriously, I'd get all muscular."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の裏庭で、ハイジは適当にサボっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the backyard of Rance Castle, Heidi was slacking off casually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メイド長も、あの城主様のおかげで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The head maid also seems busy thanks to that lord of the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕飯の支度までくらいは、ここで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I’ll just stay here at least until dinner preparation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポケットからパンを取り出して囓りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking bread out of her pocket and nibbling on it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイジはよっこらしょ、と腰を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heidi heaved herself down to sit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーーーっ……！　メイドさん……」
間一髪、ハイジはリセットの大きな口を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the last moment, Heidi blocked Reset’s big mouth
(Ugh... To think I'd run into the castle's bombshell girl

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城の爆弾娘と出くわすとは……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right where I came to slack off...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい。ココにいたことは内緒よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright. Keep it a secret that you were here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うっ、納得したような、してないような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Ugh, it feels like I agreed, but maybe not really...
"Ah... shall we do something to play?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、こないだ迷い込んできたわんわん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, that's the dog that wandered in the other day?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶー。キャンテルさんだよー」
ドラゴンなら角とか付けてよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's a dragon, you should put on horns or something!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この絵から見抜くのは不可能では……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's impossible to tell from this picture..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
